items.prompt: She __________ (study) for three hours before the exam.?
items.answer: She had been studying for three hours before the exam.

items.prompt: They __________ (play) football for two hours before it started to rain.?
items.answer: They had been playing football for two hours before it started to rain.

items.prompt: I __________ (work) on the project all week before the deadline.?
items.answer: I had been working on the project all week before the deadline.

items.prompt: He __________ (wait) for his friend for an hour before he arrived.?
items.answer: He had been waiting for his friend for an hour before he arrived.

items.prompt: We __________ (live) in that city for five years before moving.?
items.answer: We had been living in that city for five years before moving.

items.prompt: The children __________ (play) outside until it got dark.?
items.answer: The children had been playing outside until it got dark.

items.prompt: She __________ (read) the book for a month before finishing it.?
items.answer: She had been reading the book for a month before finishing it.

items.prompt: They __________ (travel) across Europe for a month before returning home.?
items.answer: They had been travelling across Europe for a month before returning home.

items.prompt: He __________ (practice) the piano for two hours before the concert.?
items.answer: He had been practising the piano for two hours before the concert.

items.prompt: I __________ (clean) the house all morning before the guests arrived.?
items.answer: I had been cleaning the house all morning before the guests arrived.

items.prompt: We __________ (discuss) the plan for weeks before making a decision.?
items.answer: We had been discussing the plan for weeks before making a decision.

items.prompt: She __________ (exercise) regularly for six months before the competition.?
items.answer: She had been exercising regularly for six months before the competition.

items.prompt: They __________ (watch) the movie for an hour before it ended.?
items.answer: They had been watching the movie for an hour before it ended.

items.prompt: He __________ (cook) dinner for two hours before they sat down to eat.?
items.answer: He had been cooking dinner for two hours before they sat down to eat.

items.prompt: I __________ (paint) the room for a week before it was finished.?
items.answer: I had been painting the room for a week before it was finished.

items.prompt: not / for / she / study / the test / before / had / it / cancelled.?
items.answer: She had not been studying for the test before it was cancelled.

items.answer: They had not been playing outside when it started to rain.

items.answer: He had not been waiting long before she arrived.

items.answer: The children had not been playing outside when it started to rain.

items.prompt: kitchen / I / not / clean / before / had / the guests / arrived.?

items.prompt: Тя беше учила за изпита преди да започне.?
items.answer: She had been studying for the exam before it started.

items.prompt: Те бяха играли футбол преди да завали дъжд.?
items.answer: They had been playing football before it started to rain.

items.prompt: Аз бях работил по проекта преди крайния срок.?
items.answer: I had been working on the project before the deadline.

items.prompt: Той беше чакал дълго преди да пристигне.?
items.answer: He had been waiting for a long time before he arrived.

items.prompt: Ние бяхме живели в този град преди да се преместим.?
items.answer: We had been living in that city before we moved.

items.prompt: Децата бяха играли навън преди да се стъмни.?
items.answer: The children had been playing outside before it got dark.

items.prompt: Тя беше чела книгата преди обсъждането.?
items.answer: She had been reading the book before the discussion.

items.prompt: Те бяха пътували дълго преди да стигнат до дестинацията.?
items.answer: They had been travelling for a long time before they reached their destination.

items.prompt: Той беше практикувал пиано преди концерта.?
items.answer: He had been practising the piano before the concert.

items.prompt: Аз бях чистил къщата преди гостите да пристигнат.?
items.answer: I had been cleaning the house before the guests arrived.
